full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,NYIN ZHAG PHYUGS GCIG LA DGE SBYOR JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL BSHAD PA LEGS BSHAD RIN CHEN 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @044B (CES NYIN ZHAG PHYUGS GCOG LA DGE SBYOR JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL BSHAD PA LEGS BSHAD RIN CHEN 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, @045A *, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DHARMA BHA DRA DPAL BZANG POS RGYUN GYI NYAMS BZHES JI LTAR MDZAD PA RNAMS NAS, ,RANG MNYAM GYI 'GRO BAS LAG TU LON NGES PA RNAMS DBYANGS CAN GRUB PA'I RDO RJES PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS MIG DMAR GYI LO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I DKAR PHYOGS DGAR BA GNYIS PAR PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS NAS BKOD PA'O, ,SHU BHA MASTU SARBA DZA GA TAm,, ,,)
author_simple: DBYANGS CAN GRUB PA'I RDO RJE,
dates_of_the_author_(зохиогдсон_өдөр): MIG DMAR GYI LO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I DKAR PHYOGS DGAR BA GNYIS,
